thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 275 2
thread.title: Peter Johnsen
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Peter Johnsen

author: Peter Johnsen
title: Peter Johnsen
text:
FIVE STARS
Unbelievable service by Ivy, almost an instant reply to my problem of non arrival of items ordered.
Package was unable to be traced, no further stock of item was available at this time and a full refund was made within 12 hours.
Remarkable backup service, I would recommend Banggood as a very honest and reliable trader.
Peter Johnsen---ORANGE----Australia
